EmailTemplate.name: Baltimore Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: vAuto Provisioning Workshop - Baltimore, MD - March 10, 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
vAuto Provisioning Workshop Baltimore, MD Tuesday, March 10, 2015
Thank you for registering for the workshop! Your registration is confirmed.
We will see you on Tuesday, March 10, 2015 at:
Location: BWI Airport Marriott 1743 West Nursery Road Linthicum Heights, MD 21090 410-859-8300
Agenda Overview: 8:30am - Check-in and Continental Breakfast (provided by vAuto) 9:00am - Meeting Start 12:00pm - Meeting End
Note: To reserve a hotel room at the BWI Airport Marriott, you may book online here <http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/bwiap-bwi-airport-marriott/> or call the hotel directly at 410-859-8300.
Don't forget to bring your laptop or other device to access the vAuto Provision tool during the wokrshop! Don't forget to bring your laptop or other device to access the vAuto Provision tool during the workshop!
